channel.title: How do I play on different servers?
channel.description: Hi, I was just wondering how to switch servers. Every time I try it, it says some thing like "server down" or something like that. Can someone help me please? Also, if it makes any difference, I am playing on a Mac. Also, I am wondering how to play on servers that have been downloaded in the forums. If you can help me with both of these, that would be great.

item.title: How do I play on different servers?
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

Most of the servesr listed are fake ips, you’ll have to read the discription.

But, if you really wanna get on one, just try a couple and im sure you’ll get one.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I play on different servers?
